thread.title: Chelsea deserve to be top — they're the best side we have played, says Man United star
thread.title_full: Chelsea deserve to be top — they're the best side we have played, says Man United star

author: David Anderson
title: Chelsea deserve to be top — they're the best side we have played, says Man United star
text:
Sport Chelsea deserve to be top — they're the best side we have played, says Man United star Memories of October's 4-0 hiding are still fresh for Ander Herrera PLUS: His targets for the run-in — and the future Share Man United ran into a blue buzzsaw at Stamford Bridge on October 23 (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get     
Ander Herrera admits it's only right that Chelsea are on course for another title. 
Antonio Conte’s men are nine points clear at the top of the Premier League, and Herrera says they are the best side he and Manchester United have faced this season. 
They handed Man United a chastening 4-0 defeat at Stamford Bridge in October in boss Jose Mourinho’s worst day in charge of the Reds, and midfielder Herrera can admire their qualities. 
“The game that we deserved to lose clearly was Chelsea, so Chelsea so far has been the best team,” he said. “They are very compact. They are very difficult to beat and they have been clear in the things that they have to do. (Photo: Getty) 
"I think they deserve to be first, to be honest.” 
Herrera, who has been a key figure in United’s 15-game unbeaten run in the league since that drubbing, stopped short of conceding the title to Chelsea. 
But the Spain midfielder did admit that United’s focus is on securing a top-four spot despite being into the last 16 of the FA Cup, as holders, and the Europa League's 32-team knockout phase. 
United have failed to qualify for the Champions League in two of the last three seasons and Herrera accepts they cannot miss out again. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
